page.title: 10BANK OF SCOTLAND
page.content: The Bank of Scotland in Peterhead has about 3, 500 customers.The Bank has an autoteller outside where you can obtain money from when the bank is closed.You get your own card and when you want money you key in your personal number.In the last 10 years the system of computers has been mainly used in the bank.In the next 5 years a new system called "Cabinet"will be used. When you enter the bank in Peterhead, there is a friendly atmosphere. The staff are always smiling and are helpful at all times. The most important part of the bank's business is depositing and lending. The Bank of Scotland plays an important part in peoples' lives in Peterhead.
